I always think that the danger at the moment is that he is effectively being punished twice for the same offense. I think in life that sometimes it is right to give someone a second chance, he added. David Cameron chose Andy Coulson as communications director after Andy Coulson had resigned from the newspaper because of the phone hacking charges. who had a string of 355 passes without being intercepted, received 21 votes from a nationwide panel of 50 media members who regularly cover the league. Simon Cowell is apparently planning to unveil his US line-up as early as next week, and if he take Cheryl Cole and Dermot with him, it will cause major headaches for ITV. A show source said: ITV is pulling out all the stops to ensure Simon Cowell can do both shows, but he still hasn't agreed anything, which is frustrating. If Cheryl Cole and Dermot also have to travel back and forth it could be tricky. The last thing they want is for any of them to pull out.
